ack.p: We gratefully acknowledge funding for this project provided by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (NSFC-31460119 and NSFC-31660164), State Forestry Administration of China (2014YB1004, 2015YB1021, 2016YB1038), Yunnan Provincial Natural Science Foundation (2013FD074), and Yunnan Forestry Department (2015SX1001, 2016SX1018 and 2017SX1012).
